Header.title: TeamBelar
Header.paragraph: The technology you use impresses no one. The experience you create with it is everything.

About.paragraph: Throughout my life I have been interested in both Technology and Business and how the two interact with each other. Because of this, my passions include Integration, specifically integrating together applications that wouldn't natively communicate, Data Management, and Software Development. My goal is to utilize technology to innovate new and better products for business application either internally or for clients. I believe mentorship is pivotol for the next generation of engineers & developers. Leading effectively & prioritizing ownership when possible is necessary for a strong team.
